description: A very popular and easy-to-care-for houseplant known for its upright, sword-like leaves. It's excellent for air purification.
water_requirements: Allow soil to dry out completely between waterings
notes: Tolerates neglect well, ideal for beginners.

description: A remarkably resilient and drought-tolerant plant with thick, waxy, dark green leaves. It's known for its ability to thrive in very low light conditions.
light_requirements: Very low to bright indirect light
water_requirements: Water sparingly, allow soil to dry out completely for several weeks
soil_type: Well-draining potting mix, sandy soil preferred
notes: Excellent choice for offices or areas with minimal natural light. All parts are toxic if ingested.

description: A classic vining houseplant with heart-shaped leaves, available in various variegations. It's incredibly versatile and easy to propagate.
water_requirements: Water when the top inch of soil feels dry
notes: Can be grown in hanging baskets or trained to climb. Many different cultivars exist (e.g., 'Marble Queen', 'Neon'). Mildly toxic to pets.
